shop.title: In-House
shop.description: Designer furniture for the discerning customer.

404.title: Sorry, we couldn't find that page. Try searching instead?

filled.title: Your Cart
filled.currency_note_html: We process all orders in {{ currency }}. While the contents of your cart are currently displayed in , the checkout will use {{ currency }} at the current exchange rate.

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.content: Products ship via FedEx within 48 hours of order. Due to the nature of our products, signature confirmation is required upon delivery. For more information, see the Delivery & Returns page.

returns.title: Returns
returns.content: We accept returns within 10 days of delivery. For more information, see the Delivery & Returns page.
